Creates an invisible zone that spreads invisibility to nearby blocks.
ability.awakenawakennomi.invisible_touch: Turns a targeted block invisible after hitting it.
ability.awakenawakennomi.diffraction.des: Diffract light to fire seven powerful rainbow explosions after a 5s channel.
ability.awakenawakennomi.airburst.descri: Creates explosive bursts of air around the user for 30 seconds; non-destructive to blocks.
ability.awakenawakennomi.blast_jump.desc: The user detonates an explosion beneath their feet, launching themselves high into the air.
The user compresses air into a focused laser that pierces the target and detonates inside them, causing devastating internal damage.
ability.awakenawakennomi.titan.descripti: Allows the user to increase their size to that of a titan.
ability.awakenawakennomi.titan_trample.d: Running speed increases with acceleration trampling any nearby entity.
ability.awakenawakennomi.titan_smash.des: Allows the user to smash as a Titan.
ability.awakenawakennomi.awaken_human_fo: Transforms the user into a awaken human, increasing its strength.
ability.awakenawakennomi.awaken_kame_wal: Transforms the user into the awaken version of kame walk point.
ability.awakenawakennomi.spin.descriptio: The user retreats into their shell and spins rapidly, knocking back nearby enemies and deflecting attacks.
ability.awakenawakennomi.awaken_giraffe_: Transforms the user into the awaken version of giraffe heavy point.
ability.awakenawakennomi.kirimanjaro.des: Hits using the hardened giraffe nose.
ability.awakenawakennomi.mogu_dig.descri: Lets the user dig trough blocks.
ability.awakenawakennomi.smooth_world.de: Creates a smooth domain around the user. Creatures inside lose traction and slide uncontrollably, weakening their ability to fight effectively.
ability.awakenawakennomi.slick_disarm.de: Coat your fists in slickness and strike your target. Their hands become too slippery to keep a grip, forcing them to drop items from both hands.
ability.awakenawakennomi.one_man_army.de: Infuse the revolutionary spirit within yourself to transcend your limits and become an unstoppable one-man army for a brief duration.
ability.awakenawakennomi.gullivers_night: Miniaturize all nearby entities, drastically reducing their physical size and offensive power.
ability.awakenawakennomi.ethereal_whispe: Launch a spectral whisper projectile that damages enemies and disorients their senses with haunting echoes.
awakenawakennomi.ability.ground_only: You must be on the ground to use this ability.
ability.message.need_suke_invisible: You need Suke Invisible to use this ability.
